title: cmd/godoc: Cannot search for identifiers containing underscores.
body:
by **bgarcia@golang.org**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
  In godoc, try searching for Old_Italic

What is the expected output?
  A match on the unicode.Old_Italic identifier

What do you see instead?
  If the server is performing full-text indexing,
  we'll see only textual search results.

  If the server is not performing full-text indexing,
  we'll return "Error in query string: all query parts must be identifiers".
